reference.title: epub.pubid.uri.stub Ant parameter
reference.shortdesc: Specifies the URI prefix stub to use in constructing the full EPUB ID value in the EPUB metadata.

section.p: Any valid URI string. If this is a relative URI it should end with a "/" character.
"http://my-URI-stub/" (this is a placeholder that will be flagged by the EPUB transform).
This parameter should normally reflect the organization that owns or publishes the EPUB, e.g., "http://mydomain.com/EPUB" or something similar.
